George W. Dole to Abraham Lincoln, 30 March 18481 You recd from our mutual friends of thiscityLetters reccommending me to the appointment of Post master of this city, Will You do me the kindness to

endorse those letters as to^the^standing and respectability of the writers & send them to me pr mail, I wish to send them to thePost Master, I presume you will not refuse me and my friends this act of kindness, It may be

that I can reciprocate this kindness sometime which I will do with pleasure
